flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=600>>600 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=166>>166 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $600 - $150 = $<<600-150=450>>450 per head.
He would make $450 x 166 = $<<450*166=74700>>74700 at the lowered price.
He could have made $600 x 166 = $<<600*166=99600>>99600 at the original price.
He would lose $99600 - $74700 = $<<99600-74700=24900>>24900
#### 24900

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 168, not 166. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
